"Stelios Eliakis" <eliakis@...> writes:

> Hi,
> I try to implement my first RestFull application and I have a problem.
> I'm using apache 2.2.3 and when I try to make a DELETE request I take the
> following error:
>
> Method failed: HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed
>
> How can I overcome this problem? What I have to change in
> httpd.conf?

You need an apache request handler that implements DELETE.

Apache does not implement DELETE for files.

You could write a CGI script or use PHP, mod_perl, mod_python or any
of those sorts of tools to implement DELETE.
